WorkflowInfo.Name: McAfee Alarm Query
WorkflowInfo.Description: Get Compueter/IP name, Virus/Malware name and Path of a McAfee Alarm
WorkflowInfo.Details:
Information
This workflow queries the McAfee server based on a specific alarm, and returns the computer name, virus name and path. This workflow should be triggered upon an incoming incident from the McAfee module.

Requirements:
* The McAfee module should be configured and in state Up.
* An Action Rule that triggers this workflow upon a new alarm should be configured.

Output (variables that can be read in a parent workflow):
* Computer - the name or IP of the infected computer.
* VirusName - the virus' file name.
* Path - the path of the virus file.
